p: Table 1 summarizes the main important physical characteristics—glass transition temperature (Tg); melting temperature (T m); tensile strength (T); deformation at break (ε b, (%)); optical properties (OP), as well as transmission of visible light, haze, gloss, and permeability (water vapor (H 2O), Oxygen gas (O 2), and carbon dioxide (CO 2))—of petroleum based polymers applied in packaging and the food packaging sector, highlighting at the same time the main applications.
